name: Sumney's Deer Jerky
author: CastIron Cook
summary: Deer jerky with a very flavorful marinade using A1 Bold and Spicy Steak Sauce®.
ingredients: ½ cup steak sauce (such as A1®)
1 tablespoon seasoned salt, or more to taste
1 tablespoon onion powder, or more to taste
1 tablespoon coarsely ground black pepper, or more to taste
2 teaspoons garlic powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
directions: Combine soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, steak sauce, seasoned salt, onion powder, pepper, flavor enhancer, garlic powder, and liquid smoke in a large glass or ceramic bowl; mix well
Add venison and toss to evenly coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight
Set a dehydrator to 155 degrees F (68 degrees C)
Remove venison from the marinade and shake off excess
Arrange venison on the dehydrator racks
Cook in the dehydrator until desired dryness, 4 to 6 hours
